summary: Provides a utility class for loading precomputed acoustic feature files (e.g., pickle, .npy, .npz) into NumPy/Torch tensors, converting them to float32, and extracting whole‑dataset or segment‑level data for downstream ASR processing.
business_intent: Facilitates the integration of external feature representations into speech‑recognition workflows, streamlining data preparation and enabling efficient training and inference with pre‑extracted acoustic features.
